description.lang: A security enabled doorlock with a keypad

inclusionNote.lang: Press button A on the Lock once

deviceDescription.productName: Smart Code with Home Connect Technology

description.lang: Parameter is used to set the User Code Type for their corresponding user codes. The door lock will only retain valid user code types (0x01, 0x03, and 0x04), all other values will be ignored. If a user code does not exist for the corresponding configuration parameter the lock will report a configuration value of 0xFF, attempts to change the user code type will be ignored.
User Code Type: Guest (Required for Year Day Schedules)
User Code Type: Worker (Required for Week Day Schedules)

Parameter is used to set the User Code Type for their corresponding user codes. The door lock will only retain valid user code types (0x01, 0x03, and 0x04), all other values will be ignored. If a user code does not exist for the corresponding configuration parameter the lock will report a configuration value of 0xFF, attempts to change the user code type will be ignored.
User Code Type: Guest (Required for Year Day Schedules)
User Code Type: Worker (Required for Week Day Schedules)

Configuration parameter 31 is one byte read only bit mask field that returns the state of the user accessible Dip-switches on the door look. READ ONLY
The Configuration Parameter 33 and 34 are used to set the SKU part numbers to the Kwikset locks. Configuration parameter 33 is the first four most significant bytes (MSB).
The Configuration Parameter 33 and 34 are used to set the SKU part numbers to the Kwikset locks. Configuration parameter 34 is the least four significant bytes (LSB).

The configuration Parameter 35 is used as read-only to report the Unique ID of the lock type. Released Board ID Unique ID Deadbolt_0034: 0x00 0x00 Lever_0032: 0x00 0x00 Refresh_Deadbolt: 0x02 0x36 Refresh DB IC 0x02 0x38 Refresh_Lever 0x03 0x36 Refresh Lever IC 0x03 0x39 Barron 0x04 0x36 Barron IC 0x04 0x40 Barron Touch 0x06 0x42
The configuration Parameter 40 is used to set the lock to its default factory, except for the anti-theft setting.
